ygData.subject: Re: Training - will this work?-guk
ygData.msgSnippet: I would think that  lvl 10-14 can go guk with a group.I was there at lvl 6. Your xp may be less or zero. the Adventure and goodies r there.Anyway i expect to
ygData.messageBody:
I would think that lvl 10-14 can go guk with a group.I was there at lvl 6.
Your xp may be less or zero.
the Adventure and goodies r there.Anyway i expect to die a few time in guk.
My feign death is not that good yet.
Dun expect alotsa stuff thou, netted, woven is in a ratio of about 15:1,
thats for evry 15 kill. maybe , just maybe only 1 item.

I would love to see u guys go.

Yiyang

-----Original Message-----
From: LKW <leekw13@...>
To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, June 17, 1999 6:20 PM
Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Training - will this work?


>From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>
>Err, can lvl 10-14 survive in Guk? My shock of lighting, thou can inflict
>78 dam per cast, but only can cast 5-6 times only in a row. If monsters
>dun die, then I sure die leh.
>
>Dun forget once high lvl player hurt 40% dam and tank, ultimately the low
>lvl player will hit more than 50%, and it's possible for monsters to turn
>their attack toward the low lvl player. My HP only 200, at most 3 hit from
>high lvl monster I sure die man! Maybe try oasis 1st lah, hehe.
>
>Zil
>
>On Thursday, June 17, 1999 5:38 PM, Gary Qui Hong Loong
>[SMTP:kanglun@...] wrote:
>> From: Gary Qui Hong Loong <kanglun@...>
>>
>> Good 'cos I just spent 120pp to buy bronze armor and own my friend
>85p
>> heheheh. We can try doing it on this Sat or Sun at Guk
>>
>> LKW wrote:
>>
>> > From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>> >
>> > Actually I've think of a way for high lvl players to help the lower lvl
>> > players to gain XP, while high lvl play gain stuffs (win-win situation
>for
>> > both):
>> >
>> > - high lvl player tank and hit a monster left 60% HP.
>> > - lower lvl player start to nuke while high lvl player stop attacking
>and
>> > just tank.
>> > - once monser kena killed, lower lvl player will get all the xp coz he
>does
>> > more dam than the high lvl player (both not in a group)
>> > - this method is more effective than to team with high lvl player,
>whack
>> > together and high lvl player quit from team when monsters abt to die
>> > (anyway this method also need the lower lvl member to do more than 50%
>of
>> > the dam).
>> >
>> > This method is best for helping classes with high nuking ability, since
>the
>> > lower lvl player have to do more than 50% of the dam. H/w, we can be
>> > flexible in using this method as the team can be made up of 1 high lvl
>> > player to tank and do 40% of the dam, while the remaining r made up of
>a
>> > group of low lvl players (so that after the high lvl player inflict 40%
>dam
>> > and the low lvl group finish the monster off with the remaining 60%
>dam).
>> > This method required NO group between the high lvl player and the low
>lvl
>> > players.
>> >
>> > To be fair, I guess the low lvl players won't mind to let the high lvl
>> > player to get all the loot for spending his time tanking and training
>them
>> > ;)
>> >
>> > Alternatively, the high lvl player and the low lvl player group can
>take
>> > turn to kill/loot, which to me it's fairer for both side.
>> >
>> > Oh b4 i forget, guys pls dun buy anymore runed totem staff on my
>behalf. I
>> > got it from a dark elf last night after long negotiation to a price of
>20pp
>> > ;) With that staff, now I can hunt wisp liao.
>> >
>> > Ziltus
>> >
>> > On Thursday, June 17, 1999 9:52 AM, Alex [SMTP:leealex@...]
>> > wrote:
>> > > From: "Alex" <leealex@...>
>> > >
>> > > I have been postponing the trip to Guk for the foloowing selfish
>reasons
>> > :P
>> > >
>> > > 1) The lower guk has very mean monsters(2oth-30th lvl) that carries
>nice
>> > > stuff: There my shopping list:
>> > > a)collar of undead protection, 5hp,7 vs disease and poison,
>> > > b)The Jorneyman boots-slightly slower than SOW, just click on it and
>> > > run.-Very nice
>> > > c) Silverplate plate bracers-+ 7hp (upperguk)
>> > > d) Azure sleeves +12hp weight only 0.4 (lower guk)
>> > > e) Kobold boots
>> > > f) mesh , mesh mesh
>> > > and the animated Hand that gives out ????
>> > >
>> > > 2) My lvl is only 17th , cant hit the lower guk yet. I can hit the
>upper
>> > guk
>> > > Gaz, taz warriors for the mesh but the next time i go back to lower
>guk,
>> > my
>> > > factions with them is so bad that any frogglock and Kolbold that will
>KOS
>> > me
>> > > onsight. I hope to hit 20+ lvl go striagth into lower guk and storm
>the
>> > > buggers.
>> > >
>> > > 3) Is so difficult to gather a group at the FIX day and time to hunt
>for
>> > at
>> > > least 3-4 hrs, camp there and go back in again at a later
>time-Together
>> > and
>> > > so on. It IS very important to be in Group.
>> > >
>> > > There my suggested list of personal in the Guk group
>> > > a) at least 1 monk
>> > > b) at least 1 Paladin
>> > > c) 1 Shaman
>> > > d) 1 Wiz
>> > > c) 1 rogue
>> > > d) anyone/any char
>> > >
>> > > Monk and paladin to tank, shaman to hit and buff, wiz to ROOT and hit
>> > -this
>> > > 4 char r the mininum for a group. Xp is NOt the purpose. It the
>Goodies
>> > we
>> > > all want. i say if u r below lvl 10th also can come for the
>adventure,
>> > thats
>> > > if u dont mind the xp.
>> > > Garren is now 18th Pal
>> > > Leshrec is 17th Wiz, can made 18th by weekend, np
>> > > Yiyang 17th Monk, may nit make 18th by weekend- got problem :P
>> > > Trifrost 14th Shaman, can make 15th by weekend, np
>> > >
>> > > Some of u are experience in Guk eg, Garren ,Sereph and Leshrec, etc ,
>> > your
>> > > comments pls.
>> > >
>> > > Please add and correct on the above. Im open for the Expedition to
>Guk.
>> > > Today is Thursday. Wanna meets on Saturday mornning?? I hve to log
> at
>> > > 1:00pm and be back at 8:pm. suggestion please.
>> > >
>> > > Yiyang of Innoruuk
>> > >
